official_title: A bill to designate the building to be constructed at 2566 Hylan Boulevard, Staten Island, New York, as the "Walter Edward Grady United States Post Office".

summary.text: Designates the building to be constructed at 2566 Hylan Boulevard, Staten Island, New York, as the Walter Edward Grady United States Post Office.
